DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare long-term joint safety efficacy ( pain relief ) investigational study drug , tanezumab compare non-steroidal anti inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) subject osteoarthritis hip knee .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety Efficacy Study Tanezumab Subjects With Osteoarthritis Hip Knee
DOC.criteria: A diagnosis osteoarthritis index hip knee base American College Rheumatology criterion Kellgren Lawrence X ray Grade 2 diagnosed Central Reader Currently receive stable dose regimen oral NSAID ( naproxen , celecoxib , diclofenac , aceclofenac , loxoprofen , ibuprofen , meloxicam , nabumetone , sulindac ketoprofen ) describe protocol along history insufficient pain relief , inability tolerate contraindication take acetaminophen , tramadol opioid treatment .
